content:
# The furnace has successfully produced 11 iron plates, which is a positive outcome. However, it is currently indicating "no ingredients to smelt," meaning it has run out of iron ore again.
# 
# The remaining coal in the furnace is 3, which is sufficient for continued operation, but without iron ore, it cannot proceed with further smelting.
# 
# To keep the production line running, I will need to gather more iron ore. Since I have already harvested from the nearby patch, I can return there to collect additional iron ore.

# Moving back to the nearest iron ore patch to harvest more iron ore.
move_to(iron_position)  # Moving to the previously identified iron ore position.
harvest_resource(iron_position, quantity=10)  # Harvesting another 10 units of iron ore.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Displaying updated inventory after harvesting.
